DIA_Grif_VZ_Train_Back_03_01: Man, what more do you want from me? Skills like yours are enviable, I'm not improving them anymore.
DIA_Grif_VZ_Train_1H1_13_01: I heard we were supposed to make good money here, and you don't even have enough for a simple training?
DIA_Grif_VZ_Train_1H5_13_01: Come on, I'm sure that you have the right amount of money.
DIA_Grif_VZ_Ambient_03_01: I'm all excited. This expedition is exactly what I expected.
DIA_Grif_VZ_Ambient_03_03: What an adventure! Dreams, high stakes, sacrifice, terror and ultimate victory! Don't worry, I won't leave out any details.
DIA_Grif_VZ_Ambient_03_04: No one will believe me when I tell them about these amazing gargoyles.
DIA_Grif_VZ_Ambient_03_02: The lighting here doesn't make it easy to sketch this creepy architecture, but I'm still sure this story will win the hearts of Old Town residents!
